coordinate_convention: Facing center; movement along line of dance: Right = clockwise, Left = counterclockwise; counts are in 2/4 with subdivisions (1,2,&) where given.

steps.notes: No action. Hands joined in V-pos; styling: proud; gentle bounce twice on every count (1,&) throughout dance.

steps.amount: R step (ct1); L cross-behind (ct2); R in place (ct&)

steps.notes: So: L step (ct1); R cross-behind (ct2); L in place (ct&).

steps.amount: R to R (ct1); L cross-behind (ct2); R to R (ct&)
steps.notes: Progress clockwise while still facing center.

steps.amount: L cross-front (ct1); R to R (ct2); L cross-front (ct&)
steps.notes: Crossing in front while continuing to travel right.
Second full cycle of the 4-measure motif.
Motif repeated 2.75 times total; there is no measure 12.

steps.part: II. STEP FORWARD AND LIFT, CROSS BEHIND
steps.amount: L step forward crossing in front of R (ct1); 2 bounces on L (cts 2,&) while free R swings to directly in front of L shin
steps.notes: Weight stays on L during bounces; free foot styling described.

steps.part: II. STEP FORWARD AND LIFT, CROSS BEHIND
steps.amount: R step directly behind L (ct1); L step directly behind R (ct2); R step to R (ct&)
steps.notes: Begins in place then initiates/continues slight rightward travel on ct&.

steps.part: II. STEP FORWARD AND LIFT, CROSS BEHIND
steps.amount: Repeat measures 1-2 five more times (6 total)

steps.direction: turning slowly to face Left while generally facing toward center orientation
steps.amount: L step forward crossing in front of R (ct1); 2 bounces on L (cts 2,&) while R swings slowly around to front of L
steps.notes: Slow turn to face left occurs through the measure.
R step forward crossing in front of L (ct1); 2 bounces on R (cts 2,&) while L swings to front of R; continue slow turning quality.

steps.amount: Repeat Fig I, measures 1-2 (cross-behind motif in place)
steps.notes: So: meas3 = Fig I meas1; meas4 = Fig I meas2.
Use Fig II meas1 action: L step fwd cross-front (ct1); 2 bounces on L (cts 2,&) with R swinging to front of L shin.

steps.amount: R step directly behind L (ct1); 2 bounces on R (cts 2,&) while L twists slightly behind R leg then swings around to front of R
steps.notes: Distinct styling: free L twists behind then swings forward during bounces.
Two full repetitions (4 measures) of the Fig II 2-measure unit.

steps.amount: Dance repeats twice more from the beginning; on last instrumental phrase continue Fig II steps (beginning with Fig II meas 2) to end of music; finish by bringing feet slowly together
steps.notes: Applies to full-dance playback/structure rather than a single measure.

inferred_relations.notes: Hands joined in V-position throughout unless otherwise stated.
Primary orientation is facing center; some slow turning to face left occurs in Fig III meas 1-2.
When text says 'moving to the R', dancers travel to their right (clockwise) along the circle/line.
